pages.text: The pestle is used to grind blocks in world and as an ingredient in mortar crafting recipes.$(br)$(br)To grind blocks in world, shift+right-click a block with the pestle in your main-hand
Gravel can be grinded into Flint$(br)$(br)Amethyst Blocks into 4 Amethyst Shards$(br)$(br)Glowstone into 4 Glowstone Dust$(br)$(br)Saltpetre Clusters into 4 Saltpetre Dust
The Mortar requires the pestle for its recipes and takes off 1 durability for each successful craft.
The pestle can be upgraded with netherite in a smithing table, increasing it's durability.
